My Work

Here are some of my projects..

Billed Mobile App

Mobile App built to bring ease in tracking and splitting bills between users, making them accountable for payments

  • Implemented a REST API with Ruby on Rails and used PostgreSQL for database management
  • Built a responsive front-end with React Native and custom CSS
  • Utilized Redux for state management
See Billed GitHub

WordGame

A timed and competitive game that allows users to type as many words that rhyme with the word on the screen.

  • Utilized external dictionary API to crosscheck rhyming words
  • Built a responsive and user-friendly front-end with JavaScript, HTML and CSS
See WordGame GitHub

TeansitUpdater

A web application to check the status and the arrival time of the trains from the stations near you.

  • Web Application built fully with Ruby on Rails for front-end and backend
  • Utilized MTA’s Real-Time Data API for real-time updates
See TransitUpdater GitHub
